item_desc1EN.	\t\tBooks that haven't been put back after being read. They're mostly gossip magazines, so there's no particular need to read them anyways.\n#~Miscellaneous Home Decor for Daily Use~\n
item_desc2EN.	
item_desc3EN.	
item_desc4EN.	\t\tScattered books. Cannot be used.
item_desc1EN.	\t\tBooks that haven't been put back after being read. They're mostly gossip magazines, so there's no particular need to read them anyways.\n#~Miscellaneous Home Decor for Daily Use~\n
